event.description:
This orientation meeting is for mothers whose daughters will be in a Bright Lights class for Anchored this fall.

Please join us if you daughter will be in either Mrs. Hufendick's class (4th -6th grade) or Mrs. Feltner's class (7th-12th grade).
event.name: Bright Lights Orientation/Dessert
